gui.core.settings module

Module: settings Auteur: creagleone Date: 2025-05-07

Description:

This module contains functions to recover system settings

Dependencies:

  • os

  • json

  • common.py

Usage Example:

  • Settings().get_settings()

  • Settings().get_settings(“key”)

Notes

  • N/A

class gui.core.settings.Settings[source]

Bases: object

Manages application settings stored in a JSON file

deserialize()[source]

Loads settings from the JSON file and stores them in the items dictionary

get_settings(key: str = None)[source]

Retrieves a specific setting or the entire settings dictionary

Parameters:

  • key (str | None, optional) – The key to look up. Returns all

  • None (settings if)

Returns:

The requested setting value or full settings dictionary

Return type:

dict | str

serialize()[source]

Saves the current settings to the settings file in JSON format
